content: the size of the finished bunny is approximately 16-18 cm it may vary though depending on the kind of yarn and hook size you used the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology instructions are easy to follow if you are familiar with basic crochet techniques feel free to add accessories to your very own bunny materials 2 5 mm hook cotton yarn i used cotton baby soft from alize - in blue and yellow color safety eyes 6 0 mm black embroidery thread stuffing yarn needle stitch marker i used black thread
